KeyName.default: SSH Key Name to associate with the instances

SSHLocationCIDR.default: IP CIDR to allow ssh from into the instances, defaults to 0.0.0.0/0

AllowSSH.default: Allow ssh on all the instances, from the specified CIDR in SSHLocationCIDR.

DgraphReplicaCount.default: Replication factor for each group in Dgraph.

AlphaInstanceCount.default: Number of EC2 instances to launch as dgraph alpha nodes.

AlphaInstanceType.default: AWS instance types to use for dgraph alpha nodes

AlphaDiskSize.default: Disk size to use for dgraph alpha nodes.

ZeroInstanceCount.default: Number of EC2 instances to launch as dgraph zero nodes.

ZeroInstanceType.default: AWS instance types to use for dgraph Zero nodes.

ZeroDiskSize.default: Disk size to use for dgraph Zero nodes.

RatelInstanceCount.default: Number of EC2 instances to launch as dgraph ratel nodes.

RatelInstanceType.default: AWS instance types to use for dgraph Ratel nodes

RatelDiskSize.default: Disk size to use for dgraph Ratel nodes.

Tag.default: Common tag for all the deployed resources by template

VpcClassB.Description: Class B of Virtual Private Cloud's (VPC) CIDR, e.g. 10.XXX.0.0/16

AllowPublicAccess.Description: Allow public access for dgraph ratel and dgraph alpha HTTP endpoints. *Avoid this in production environment*.

SSHLocationCIDR.Description: The IP address range that can be used to SSH to the EC2 instances
SSHLocationCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

AllowSSH.Description: Allow ssh on all the instances, from the specified CIDR in SSHLocationCIDR.

DgraphReplicaCount.Description: Replication factor for each group in dgraph.

AlphaInstanceCount.Description: Number of EC2 instances to launch as dgraph alpha nodes.

AlphaInstanceType.Description: Instance type for dgraph alpha nodes
AlphaInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type which supports autoscaling groups.

AlphaDiskSize.Description: Size in GB of the EBS io1 volume on each alpha node

AlphaDiskIops.Description: IOPS of the EBS io1 volume on each alpha node

ZeroInstanceCount.Description: Number of EC2 instances to launch as dgraph zero nodes.

ZeroInstanceType.Description: Instance type for dgraph Zero nodes
ZeroInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

ZeroDiskSize.Description: Size in GB of the EBS io1 volume on each Zero node

ZeroDiskIops.Description: IOPS of the EBS io1 volume on each Zero node

RatelInstanceCount.Description: Number of EC2 instances to launch as dgraph ratel nodes.

RatelInstanceType.Description: Instance type for dgraph Ratel nodes
RatelInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

Tag.Description: Common tag to use for all the deployments.

InstanceAMI.Description: AWS AMI to use for the instance.

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for the client to connect to the dgraph cluster.
Allow traffic from public internet to go to port 8080 on Dgraph alpha nodes
Allow traffic from ALB to go to port 8080 on Dgraph alpha nodes
Allow traffic from ALB to go to port 8000 on Dgraph Ratel nodes
Allow all traffic between Dgraph instances, on required ports.

VpcCidr.Description: VPC CIDR block created for the dgraph cluster deployment.

ClientSecurityGroupId.Description: Client security group Id for access to dgraph endpoints via created ALB.

LBPublicDNS.Description: DNS entry corresponding to the ALB associated with the dgraph cluster.
